original: Majjhima Nikāya 46
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahādhammasamādānasutta
analyzed: mahādhammasamādānasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sattā evaṅkāmā evaṁchandā evaṁadhippāyā:
analyzed: yebhuyyena bhikkhave sattāḥ evaṅkāmāḥ eva chandāḥ eva adhippāyāḥ

original: ‘aho vata aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā parihāyeyyuṁ, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍheyyun’ti.
analyzed: aho vata aniṭṭhāḥ a kantāḥ a manāpāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyeyyu iṭṭhā kantā manāpāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍheyyunti

original: Tesaṁ, bhikkhave, sattānaṁ evaṅkāmānaṁ evaṁchandānaṁ evaṁadhippāyānaṁ aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dhammā parihāyanti.
analyzed: tesa bhikkhave sattānam evaṅkāmānam eva chandānam eva adhippāyānam aniṭṭhāḥ akantāḥ amanāpāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iṭṭhāḥ kantāḥ manāpāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: Tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, kaṁ hetuṁ paccethā”ti?
analyzed: tatra tumhe bhikkhave kam hetum paccetha ati

original: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā, bhagavaṁnettikā, bhagavaṁpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata,
analyzed: bhagava mūlakāḥ no bhante dhammāḥ bhagava nettikāḥ bhagava paṭisaraṇā sādhu vata

original: bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho; bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: bhante bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa atthaḥ bhagavataḥ sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano, ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: sevitabbe dhamme na jānāti asevitabbe dhamme na jānāti, bhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti abhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti.
analyzed: sevitabbe dhamme na jānāti a sevitabbe dhamme na jānāti bhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti a bhajitabbe dhamme na jānāti

original: So sevitabbe dhamme ajānanto asevitabbe dhamme ajānanto, bhajitabbe dhamme ajānanto
analyzed: so sevitabbe dhamme a jānantaḥ a sevitabbe dhamme a jānantaḥ bhajitabbe dhamme a jānantaḥ

original: abhajitabbe dhamme ajānanto, asevitabbe dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati,
analyzed: a bhajitabbe dhamme a jānantaḥ a sevitabbe dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati

original: abhajitabbe dhamme bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati.
analyzed: a bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati

original: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme sevato sevitabbe dhamme asevato, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajato
analyzed: tassa a sevitabbe dhamme sevataḥ sevitabbe dhamme a sevataḥ a bhajitabbe dhamme bhajataḥ

original: bhajitabbe dhamme abhajato aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, iṭṭhā kantā
analyzed: bhajitabbe dhamme a bhajataḥ an iṭṭhāḥ a kantāḥ a manāpāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iṭṭhā kantā

original: manāpā dhammā parihāyanti.
analyzed: manāpāḥ dhammā parihāyanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
analyzed: evam ha ita bhikkhave hoti yathā tam a viddasunaḥ

original: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako, ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto,
analyzed: sutavā ca kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ ariyānam dassāvī ariya dhammassa kovidaḥ ariya dhamme su vinītaḥ sappurisānam dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme su vinītaḥ

original: sevitabbe dhamme jānāti asevitabbe dhamme jānāti, bhajitabbe dhamme jānāti abhajitabbe dhamme jānāti.
analyzed: sevitabbe dhamme jānāti a sevitabbe dhamme jānāti bhajitabbe dhamme jānāti a bhajitabbe dhamme jānāti

original: So sevitabbe dhamme jānanto asevitabbe dhamme jānanto, bhajitabbe dhamme jānanto
analyzed: so sevitabbe dhamme jānantaḥ a sevitabbe dhamme jānantaḥ bhajitabbe dhamme jānantaḥ

original: abhajitabbe dhamme jānanto, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati,
analyzed: a bhajitabbe dhamme jānantaḥ a sevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati

original: abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati.
analyzed: a bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati

original: Tassa asevitabbe dhamme asevato sevitabbe dhamme sevato, abhajitabbe dhamme abhajato
analyzed: tassa a sevitabbe dhamme a sevataḥ sevitabbe dhamme sevataḥ a bhajitabbe dhamme a bhajataḥ

original: bhajitabbe dhamme bhajato, aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā parihāyanti, iṭṭhā kantā
analyzed: bhajitabbe dhamme bhajataḥ aniṭṭhāḥ akantāḥ amanāpāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti iṭṭhā kantā

original: manāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti.
analyzed: manāpāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ viddasuno.
analyzed: evam ha ita bhikkhave hoti yathā tam viddasunaḥ

original: Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānāni.
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave dhamma samādānāni

original: Katamāni cattāri?
analyzed: katamāni cattāri

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatiñca dukkha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham āyatim sukha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipāka

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ, taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatim ca dukkha vipāka tam a vidvā a vijja āgataḥ yathābhūtam na ppajānāti

original: ‘idaṁ kho dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākan’ti.
analyzed: idam kho dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatim ca dukkha vipākam ti

original: Taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ appajānanto taṁ sevati, taṁ na parivajjeti.
analyzed: tam a vidvā a vijja āgataḥ yathābhūtam ap pajānantaḥ tam sevati tam na parivajjeti

original: Tassa taṁ sevato, taṁ aparivajjayato, aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dhammā parihāyanti.
analyzed: tassa tam sevataḥ tam a parivajjayataḥ an iṭṭhāḥ a kantāḥ a manāpāḥ dhammāḥ abhivaḍḍhanti iṭṭhāḥ kantāḥ manāpāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Evañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yathā taṁ aviddasuno.
analyzed: evam ha ita bhikkhave hoti yathā tam a viddasunaḥ

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ taṁ avidvā avijjāgato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipākam tam a vidvā avijjā gataḥ yathābhūtam na ppajānāti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena pāṇātipātī hoti, pāṇātipātapaccayā ca dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri dhammasamādānāni.

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tittakālābu visena saṁsaṭṭho.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave tittaka alābu visena sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya jīvitu kāmaḥ a maritu kāmaḥ sukha kāmaḥ dukkha ppaṭikūlo

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, ayaṁ tittakālābu visena saṁsaṭṭho,
analyzed: ambho purisa ayam tittaka alābu visena sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
analyzed: sace ākaṅkhasi piva

original: Tassa te pivato ceva nacchādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
analyzed: tassa te pivataḥ ca iva na chādessati vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana maraṇam vā nigacchasi maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: So taṁ appaṭisaṅkhāya piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
analyzed: saḥ tam a paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya na paṭinissajjeyya

original: Tassa taṁ pivato ceva nacchādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: tassa tam pivataḥ ca iva na chādeyya vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana maraṇam vā nigaccheyya maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ vadāmi, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam dhamma samādānam vadāmi yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatim ca dukkha vipāka

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave āpānīyakasaḥ vaṇṇa sampannaḥ gandha sampannaḥ rasa sampannaḥ

original: So ca kho visena saṁsaṭṭho.
analyzed: so ca kho visena sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya jīvitu kāmaḥ a maritu kāmaḥ sukha kāmaḥ dukkha ppaṭikūlo

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

analyzed: ambho purisa ayam āpānīyakasaḥ vaṇṇa sampannaḥ gandha sampannaḥ rasa sampannaḥ

original: So ca kho visena saṁsaṭṭho,
analyzed: so ca kho visena sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
analyzed: sace ākaṅkhasi piva

original: Tassa te pivatohi kho chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
analyzed: tassa te pivataḥ hi kho chādessati vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana maraṇam vā nigacchasi maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: So taṁ appaṭisaṅkhāya piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
analyzed: saḥ tam a paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya na paṭinissajjeyya

original: Tassa taṁ pivatohi kho chādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ vadāmi, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam dhamma samādānam vadāmi yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipāka

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pūtimuttaṁ nānābhesajjehi saṁsaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave pūti muttam nānā bhesajjehi

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya paṇḍukarogī.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya paṇḍuka rogī

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, idaṁ pūtimuttaṁ nānābhesajjehi saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
analyzed: ambho purisaḥ idam pūti muttam nānā bhesajjehi sasaṭṭha sace ākaṅkhasi piva

original: Tassa te pivatohi kho nacchādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī bhavissasī’ti.
analyzed: tassa te pivataḥ hi kho na chādessati vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana sukhī bhavissasi iti

original: So taṁ paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
analyzed: saḥ tam paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya na paṭinissajjeyya

original: Tassa taṁ pivatohi kho nacchādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa.
analyzed: tassa tam pivataḥ hi kho vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ vadāmi, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam dhamma samādānam vadāmi yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham āyatim sukha vipāka

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitañca ekajjhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitam ca ekajjham

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya lohitapakkhandiko.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya lohita pakkhandikaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, idaṁ dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitañca ekajjhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, sace ākaṅkhasi piva.
analyzed: ambho purisaḥ idam dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitam ca ekajjham sasaṭṭha sace ākaṅkhasi piva

original: Tassa te pivato ceva chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī bhavissasī’ti.
analyzed: tassa te pivataḥ ca iva chādessati vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana sukhī bhavissasi iti

original: So taṁ paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
analyzed: saḥ tam paṭisaṅkhāya piveyya na paṭinissajjeyya

original: Tassa taṁ pivato ceva chādeyya vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa.
analyzed: tassa tam pivataḥ ca iva chādeyya vaṇṇena api gandhena api rasena api pivitvā ca pana sukhī assa

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ vadāmi, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam dhamma samādānam vadāmi yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipāka

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vassānaṁ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave vassānam pacchime māse sarada samaye viddhe vigata valāhake

original: deve ādicco nabhaṁ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṁ ākāsagataṁ tamagataṁ abhivihacca bhāsate
analyzed: deve ādiccaḥ nabham abbhussakkamānaḥ sabbam ākāsa gatam tama gatam abhivihacca bhāsate

original: ca tapate ca virocate ca;
analyzed: ca tapate ca virocate ca

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ tadaññe puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavāde abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yam idam dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipākam tad aññe puthu samaṇa brāhmaṇa para pavāde abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahādhammasamādānasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: mahādhammasamādāna suttam niṭṭhitam chaṭṭha
